title: Eclipse Monthly (Eclipse)
description:
The ECUP spits on its hands to improve its grip and really puts its back into it with 'Eclipse Monthly'!

Wiki Don't Lose That Number say:

Eclipse Monthly was a full color comics anthology title published by Eclipse Comics. It introduced many characters that would later be featured in their own series or collections. Such as:

    Capt. Quick and A Foozle by Marshall Rogers

    Rio by Doug Wildey

    Static by Steve Ditko

    The Masked Man by B.C. Boyer

    Dope by Sax Rohmer and Trina Robbins

    Ragamuffins by Don McGregor and Gene Colan

The series ran for ten issues, starting in 1983 and ending in 1984. This torrent contains the full run.
